channel.title: Adding world objects, kinda
channel.description: ok how do i add objects on project 16. like lets say i want a magic tree in the middle of varock. how would i go aboutdoing that. also can, or, does anyone have a full list of all the player emotes, like when you bend over when stealing from a stall, or on your knees when planting something. oh and how do i put items on the floor, like when i burn logs, it actaully makes a fire on the floor.

item.title: Adding world objects, kinda
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
